title: [gameplay] yi
body: q'd a yi with nami and he was still able to q while in the bubble i've seen a couple of other instances where yi was cc'd and still was able to q like with heimer stun and karma w

replies.body: Hi MrsDrPeppaDude, a player can't interrupt a spell cast with a crowd control spell, this is what you are observing.

And Yi in particular, if he times his Q right he becomes untargeteable (and ceases to be a valid target for certain spells, allowing him to dodge Karthus ult and such)

And for all Champions, abilities cannot be interrupted during their *cast* time. Normally this is quite short, but Ez and Lux ults for example are longer but can't be stopped unless they are killed.
To put what Exgeniar said a bit more clearly: If Master Yi starts casting the Q before the cc, then cc won't stop Yi from finishing the cast.
I think he means Yi could use Q while cc'd.
